title.rendered: McDonald’s Launches their Early Talent Program with Handshake

content.rendered: Handshake_McDonalds_CaseStudy

excerpt.rendered: McDonald’s builds a function from scratch with help from the largest early talent network. The result? Nearly 3x the applicants year-over-year.
